page.title: 16Accident
page.content: There was a coach crash in France on Wednesday May 29th 1985. The coach started from St. Albans. There were children from 2 secondary schools, Beaumont and Verulam, on the coach. They were on holiday in France. I knew one of the boys, he used to come to our school. Some of them died in the coach. Others survived. Some broke their legs and their backs. The coach went on to gravel and rolled over. They went to hospital. When their parents heard they took an emergency flight and went to France. Everyone in St. Albans feels sorry for them and is trying to help them by raising money to give to the Schools Disaster Fund. We are trying to help them because their schools are near our school.
